manifestTitle.description: This is the title of the extension.

manifestDescription.description: This is the description of the extension.

popupStatusHeading.descripton: This is the placeholder template for the status inside the popup.

popupStatusNotReady.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is not ready.
popupStatusNotReady.message: Waiting to detect a registered page.

popupStatusReady.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is ready.
popupStatusReady.message: Currently detecting a registered page.  Ready.

popupStatusWorking.description: This is the status text that appears in the popup when extension is working.

popupReadyButton.description: This is the text that appears in the popup for starting the extension.

popupWorkingButton.description: This is the text that appears in the popup for stopping the extension.

iconTitleNotReady.description: This is the icon title that appears when extension is not ready.
iconTitleNotReady.message: This page is not registered as a GPT starting point.

iconTitleReady.description: This is the icon title that appears when extension is ready.
iconTitleReady.message: This page is registered as a GPT starting point.

iconTitleWorking.description: This is the icon title that appears when extension is working.

notificationAppStarted.description: This is the notification that appears when the app has started working
notificationAppStarted.message: GPT Do Nothing has started working

notificationAppStopped.description: This is the notification that appears when the app has stopped working
notificationAppStopped.message: GPT Do Nothing has stopped working

notificationAppStoppedForReason.description: This is the notification that appears when the app has stopped working for a particular reason

notificationAppStoppedReasonTabClosed.description: This is the reason that appears in app stop notification when GPT site tab gets closed
